column4: be glad you can't use automatix. It's a good way to break your system.
regulars on this channel have seen too many systems broken by autobreakitz, and too much bad attitude from the dev team of the thing... hence the default 'avoid entirely' attitude here...
if your issue is with Automatix, then #automatix is probably a better channel for you than #ubuntu...
which of those repos isn't authenticating?
odd. you've got a standard repo set except for the automatix & wine ones - you probably need to add the keys for either/both of them
let me find you a link, it's been ages since I've added keys manually for repos...
scroll down to the 'Managing Keys' section
no idea, I still don't run Edgy myself
the URL I gave you does?
on the URL I gave you? Any keys on there will probably be for demonstration purposes
the various 3rd-party repos you've added should have their keys listed
automatix doesn't have it's repo keys listed on it's website somewhere?
that and the wine repo keys, those are the ones I bet you'll need. Ubuntu should have all of it's own repo keys already for the official repos you use
